author: Vanmala Subramaniam
title: ‘So easy I thought it was fake’: CRA’s CERB system gets stellar reviews in first days of operation
description: The integrity of the system that asks three simple questions will be dealt with when people file their tax returns next year
content:
It took less than two hours for the first user reviews to arrive after the federal governments Canada Emergency Response Benefit (CERB) online portal opened Monday morning. 
Successfully applied for the #CERB at 6.01am Fully expected it to crash. It didnt. E… [+5263 chars]
